Articles.Content: Currently as it stands once you transmit data from an antenna, you can never extend it again. I've been going NUTS trying to find where I can fix that so I can make a quick modulemanager file, but I can't! Does anyone know what I should even be looking at?
What do you mean? I can extend and retract antennas just fine, whether I transmit data or not. Can you give any more information? Like which antenna for example?

What do you mean? I can extend and retract antennas just fine, whether I transmit data or not. Can you give any more information? Like which antenna for example?

Only if you set it to an action group.

Once you've transmitted data, you lose the generic "Extend" animation on all antenna parts.

Seems like you should be able to extend an antenna and have it NOT retract. The high-gain, for example. It's absurd that it extends, then retracts every time, it should be extended ONCE, and if anything never retract again (like the unshielded solar panel arrays).

Only if you set it to an action group.

really? wow...

really? wow...

Just to clarify, you lose it on the antenna you transmitted from, and it does this with any of the antenna parts.

Not that it happens to ALL antenna parts on the ship afterwards.
